posts.postText:
Steam Name: Typhon
Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:17426299 
Offense: RDM'd me for no reason as a detective (Couldn't even get his excuse right) and when I called him on it proceeded to argue about if ro about a half-hour, which presumably started to piss off the other users.
Admins: Some mods were on, although they didn't really do anything
Proof:
While I don't have proof of the actual RDM, as I was too pissed to check the log, I do have screenshots of the user starting the argument over everything for literally no reason.
 http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/53/58803122.png 

http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/53/58803122.png (Incase the image doesn't show up)

You can see that before our argument started (It continued much longer then what you see) Other members were getting extremely agitated with him and his constant complaining. This game is meant to be a fun environment for all, not a proving ground for people who don't follow rules and then start yelling at everyone about it.
you should take direct link for picture for it dont load the ads.
